name: string
desc: string

name: Pre-Expedition
desc: The Prep Stage includes the Land Unknown; the Sentries; and the Ultimate Arms Race. The final ranking is decided by the total points of the three stages.

name: The Land Unknown
desc: Kill the Dark Legion to get Intelligence Boxes; use these boxes to get Intelligence Shards; collect and get Intelligence to earn points and the following rewards

name: The Sentries
desc: Donate units to earn points. Complete the task to get the following rewards

name: Ultimate Arms Race
desc: Kill Warhammer-4K to earn points. Complete the task to get the following rewards

name: Eternal Land
desc: Begin the journey to the Eternal Land. Only the best of the Warzones; Alliances and Commanders will be the real winners.

name: Perimeter of the Eternal Land
desc: The start point of all commanders. This area can be expanded by building alliance fortresses and power stations

name: Battle Instructions
desc: In Eternal Land; the battle rules for Ark; Alliance and Neutral buildings have been updated. ForÂ details; click the "!" button on the left.
building_desc: 1. For battles in Alliance and Neutral Buildings; the defending party will now battle with a random troop garrisoned in the Buildings (previously; the troop with the highest CP would be sent to the battle).\n2. During continuous battles that take place in Alliance and Neutral buildings; as well as the Ark; the HP of damaged troops will not be restored in the next battle; but will be restored when they return to the base.

name: Expedition Outpost
desc: Taking over the buildings will gain you Alliance points and Warzone points. You'll also get item rewards for the first time you take over the buildings. Hold it for attribute bonuses.
building_desc: The temporary camp built by the Dark Legion. It illuminates the dark side of history; and now; you are looking at it.

name: Expedition Base
desc: After taking over the Base; commanders may start the "Rebuild the Expedition Base" mission. The first Alliance that takes over the Expedition Base will get the following rewards
building_desc: The aborigines of the Eternal Land built a magnificent fortress here. It was a glorious era belonging to their civilization. But with the invasion of the Dark Legion and the defeat of the Aboriginal people; they have also gradually become desolate under the erosion of time

name: Rebuild the Expedition Base
desc: The Rebuild the Expedition Base contains three stages; and after the reconstruction; commanders may gain following attributes

name: Lv.1 Gate
desc: The occupied Alliances may go to the second area. When it is opened; commanders may compete for it. The first Alliance that takes it over will get the following rewards
building_desc: The Dark legion established these Gates between the areas; and there are residual troops guarding it. Only by conquering the Gate can you pass between the two adjacent areas.

name: Entering the Eternal Land
desc: The second area in the Eternal Land; where commanders from adjacent Warzones may encounter each other; and battles may occur

name: Special Resource Area
desc: Taking over the Mine and gathering resources may earn Gems. Gathering and defeating Dark Forces may gain you more points here.
building_desc: The Eternal Land has 10 Special Resource Areas; which will be opened based on the progress of the Eternal Land. The Special Resource Area will refresh Dark Forces and resource regularly. When the area is opened; Amethyst can be collected in this area.

name: Earthshaker Ark
desc: The Earthshaker Ark conTest has begun. Members of the winning Alliance will get rewards.

name: Military Base
desc: Taking over the buildings will gain you Alliance points and Warzone points. You'll also get item rewards for the first time you take over the buildings. Hold it for attribute bonuses.
building_desc: The military base of the Dark Legion; long-term military training and battle has made this base easy to defend and difficult to attack. It also has great power

name: Military Fortress
desc: Taking over the buildings will gain you Alliance points and Warzone points. You'll also get item rewards for the first time you take over the buildings. Hold it for attribute bonuses.
building_desc: Military Fortress surrounded by 4 Military Bases; heavily guarded here; and supported by the most advanced science and technology of the Dark Legion. If you want to enter the deeper area of the Eternal Land; this fortress will be the difficulty we have to face.

name: Lv.2 Gate
desc: The occupied Alliances may go to the third area. When it is opened; commanders may compete for it. The first Alliance that takes it over will get the following rewards
building_desc: The Dark legion established these Gates between the areas; and there are residual troops guarding it. Only by conquering the Gate can you pass between the two adjacent areas.

name: Deep into the Eternal Land
desc: The third area in the Eternal Land; where commanders from four adjacent Warzones may encounter each other

name: Special Resource Area
desc: Taking over the Mine and gathering resources may earn Gems. Gathering and defeating Dark Forces may gain you more points here.
building_desc: The Eternal Land has 10 Special Resource Areas; which will be opened based on the progress of the Eternal Land. The Special Resource Area will refresh Dark Forces and resource regularly. When the area is opened; Amethyst can be collected in this area.

name: Flint Ark
desc: The Flint Ark conTest has begun. Members of the winning Alliance will get rewards.

name: Research Facility
desc: Taking over the buildings will gain you Alliance points and Warzone points. You'll also get item rewards for the first time you take over the buildings. Hold it for attribute bonuses.
building_desc: The secret research institute of the Dark Legion; all evil research and powerful weapons are born from here. These soldiers are bathed in dark experiments all year round; and they are extremely powerful. Destroying and conquering these research institutes will be our full victory against the Dark Legion.

name: Lv.3 Gate
desc: The occupied Alliances may go to the center of the Eternal Land and compete for the Eternal City. The first Alliance that takes it over will get the following rewards
building_desc: The Dark legion established these Gates between the areas; and there are residual troops guarding it. Only by conquering the Gate can you pass between the two adjacent areas.

name: Special Resource Area
desc: Taking over the Mine and gathering resources may earn Gems. Gathering and defeating Dark Forces may gain you more points here.
building_desc: The Eternal Land has 10 Special Resource Areas; which will be opened based on the progress of the Eternal Land. The Special Resource Area will refresh Dark Forces and resource regularly. When the area is opened; Amethyst can be collected in this area.

name: Battle for the Eternal Land
desc: The central area of the Eternal Land; where commanders from eight Warzones may encounter. You may attack start points of other Warzones.

name: Molten Ark
desc: The Molten Ark conTest has begun. Members of the winning Alliance will get rewards.

name: Eternal City
desc: Taking over the buildings will gain you Alliance points and Warzone points. You'll also get item rewards for the first time you take over the buildings. Hold it for attribute bonuses.
building_desc: The secret information of the Dark Legion shows that this is the most central place in the world. Only the Tyrant is eligible to live in the Eternal City. At the same time; the Dark Legion stationed in the Eternal City is also the most elite force. Anyone who dares to challenge the Eternal City is buried here. The Eternal City provides its owner with eternal power

name: Claim Rewards
desc: Commanders may collect rewards for completed tasks. Ranking rewards will be sent as well (below are possible rewards available)

name: Event ends
desc: The commanders will return to their servers; and you'll not be able to claim the unclaimed rewards
